review: I enjoy watching more movies and mini seires. I don't understand why old movies like Midway cost money.

review: It's a good tv box to start with.  I used it on my kid's TV so they can watch neflix kids movies.
author: Mark Robertson

review: Works great.  Set up was fairly easy and intuitive.  Gives access to numerous services, apps and sites.  Switching back and forth between them is quick.  Remote is simple and easy to use.  Rewind and fast forward work well.
author: Michael6271

review: Picture locks up and check internet connection pops up a lot. Then it shows internet signal is good, Bert aggregating!

review: Easy to navigate, a lot of viewing choices and a great deal for the money!
author: Chris Thompson
